sentences.sentence: I'll come back to the land of my forebears.
The Boskops coexisted with our Homo sapiens forebears.
sentences.translation: 博斯·科普人曾与我们的智人祖先和平共处。

sentences.sentence: And if we get our land back I want to rebuild my forebears' house.
sentences.translation: “如果能要回土地，我打算重新修建祖宗留下的房屋”。
